summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 13.4°C) and outside temperature (down 10.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 408 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and mostly calm with light air movement. A few light raindrops may fall, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and the light is absent. Changeable conditions.
